title: Website Design references
content:
What is the most elegant Website-designing you’ve ever seen? Please tell me the reason. Any advance would be of great help

 [‹ English letter cutter hand typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706080606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32492 "Go to previous forum topic") [Century Gothic as a body text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706080606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32474 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wedbanz

comments.content:
“What is the most elegant Website-designing you’ve ever seen?”

[http://www.google.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706080606/http:/www.google.com/ "http://www.google.com")

“Please tell me the reason.”

It works without any hurdles.

[http://designarchives.aiga.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706080606/http:/designarchives.aiga.org/ "http://designarchives.aiga.org/")

navigation is seamless, content is gorgeous, no annoying anything else.
